item.title: The most influential book I read this year
item.description: A book that provides a rare insight into the basic form of political life – the individual.

item.title: India emerges as a data-centre hub
item.description: Despite major investments from Google and Microsoft, India must tackle infrastructure, geographical, and regulatory hurdles to establish itself as an AI hub.

item.title: Why China’s spat with Japan could still get worse
item.description: Officials have held back from encouraging consumer boycotts–for now

item.description: In the past it has foretold wider weakness. This time may be different
